trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.CreatingCookie"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Disponibiliza dados para o <xref href="System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.CreatingCookie"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The CreatingCookieEventArgs class supplies values to any <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.CreatingCookie> event handler.
trans-unit.target: A classe de CreatingCookieEventArgs fornece valores para qualquer <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.CreatingCookie>processador de eventos.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.CreatingCookie>

trans-unit.source: By using the properties of this class, you can retrieve user credentials when you create a custom authentication cookie.
trans-unit.target: Utilizando as propriedades desta classe, pode obter credenciais do utilizador quando criar um cookie de autenticação personalizado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> class raises the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.CreatingCookie> event when it sets the authentication cookie, after the user credentials have been authenticated.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>classe gera o <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.CreatingCookie>evento quando define o cookie de autenticação, depois das credenciais de utilizador que tenham sido autenticadas.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.CreatingCookie> </xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> class constructs a CreatingCookieEventArgs object and passes it to any <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.CreatingCookie> event handler.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>classe constrói um objeto de CreatingCookieEventArgs e passa-a para qualquer <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.CreatingCookie>processador de eventos.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.CreatingCookie> </xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>

trans-unit.source: You retrieve the user credentials through the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.CreatingCookieEventArgs.UserName%2A><xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.CreatingCookieEventArgs.Password%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.CreatingCookieEventArgs.CustomCredential%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Obter as credenciais do utilizador através de <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.CreatingCookieEventArgs.UserName%2A> <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.CreatingCookieEventArgs.Password%2A>, e <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.CreatingCookieEventArgs.CustomCredential%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.CreatingCookieEventArgs.CustomCredential%2A> </xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.CreatingCookieEventArgs.Password%2A></xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.CreatingCookieEventArgs.UserName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.CreatingCookieEventArgs.CustomCredential%2A> property can contain any custom values that you need in order to authenticate, such as an identification number.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.CreatingCookieEventArgs.CustomCredential%2A>propriedade pode conter quaisquer valores personalizados que precisa para autenticar, por exemplo, um número de identificação.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.CreatingCookieEventArgs.CustomCredential%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.CreatingCookieEventArgs.IsPersistent%2A> property indicates whether the authentication cookie should be retained past the current session.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.CreatingCookieEventArgs.IsPersistent%2A>propriedade indica se o cookie de autenticação deve ser mantido anteriores na sessão atual.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.CreatingCookieEventArgs.IsPersistent%2A>

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.CreatingCookieEventArgs.CookieIsSet%2A> property to `true` if you create the authentication cookie, so that the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> class does not create the cookie.
trans-unit.target: Definir o <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.CreatingCookieEventArgs.CookieIsSet%2A>propriedade `true` se criar o cookie de autenticação, para que o <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>classe não cria o cookie.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> </xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.CreatingCookieEventArgs.CookieIsSet%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the authentication cookie has been created.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o cookie de autenticação foi criado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> class checks the CookieIsSet property to determine whether the authentication cookie has been created.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>classe verifica a propriedade CookieIsSet para determinar se foi criado o cookie de autenticação.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>

trans-unit.source: You set this value to `true` if you create an authentication cookie in an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.CreatingCookie> event.
trans-unit.target: Definir este valor como `true` se criar um cookie de autenticação um processador de eventos para o <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.CreatingCookie>eventos.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.CreatingCookie>

trans-unit.source: If CookieIsSet is set to `false` (the default value), the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> class creates an authentication cookie, This overwrites any cookie that you have created in the handler for the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.CreatingCookie> event.
trans-unit.target: Se CookieIsSet estiver definido como `false` (o valor predefinido), o <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>classe cria um cookie de autenticação, esta ação substitui quaisquer cookie que tenha criado no processador para o <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.CreatingCookie>eventos.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.CreatingCookie> </xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the authentication cookie was created; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se tiver sido criado o cookie de autenticação; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets additional authentication values that are provided by the user.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os valores de autenticação adicional que são fornecidos pelo utilizador.

trans-unit.source: You use the CustomCredential property to retrieve custom values in the authentication ticket.
trans-unit.target: Utilize a propriedade CustomCredential obter valores personalizados nos bilhetes de autenticação.

trans-unit.source: The CustomCredential property contains the value passed to the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Login%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade CustomCredential contém o valor transmitido para o <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Login%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Login%2A>

trans-unit.source: Typically, this property is used to pass custom values that must be validated with the user name and password, such as an identification number.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, esta propriedade é utilizada para passar valores personalizados que tem de ser validados com o nome de utilizador e palavra-passe, por exemplo, um número de identificação.

trans-unit.source: If more than one value is stored in the property, you must parse the CustomCredential property in order to retrieve values.
trans-unit.target: Se mais do que um valor é armazenado na propriedade, tem de analisar a propriedade CustomCredential para obter os valores.

trans-unit.source: The custom values required for authentication, other than user name and password.
trans-unit.target: Os valores personalizados necessários para a autenticação, que não seja o nome de utilizador e palavra-passe.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the authentication cookie should be retained beyond the current session.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o cookie de autenticação deve ser mantido para além da sessão atual.

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationTicket> object, you can use the IsPersistent property to specify whether the authentication cookie is retained beyond the current session.
trans-unit.target: Quando cria um <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationTicket>objeto, pode utilizar a propriedade IsPersistent para especificar se o cookie de autenticação é mantido para além da sessão atual.</xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationTicket>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the cookie should be retained beyond the current session; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o cookie deve ser mantido para além da sessão atual; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the password for the user.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a palavra-passe para o utilizador.

trans-unit.source: You use the Password property to retrieve the password when you set custom values in the authentication ticket.
trans-unit.target: Utilize a propriedade de palavra-passe para obter a palavra-passe quando especificar valores personalizados nos bilhetes de autenticação.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Do not save the value of the Password property in the authentication ticket.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Não guarde o valor da propriedade de palavra-passe nos bilhetes de autenticação.

trans-unit.source: A malicious user can access the cookie and retrieve the password even though the cookie is encrypted.
trans-unit.target: Um utilizador mal intencionado pode aceder o cookie e obter a palavra-passe, apesar do cookie é encriptado.

trans-unit.source: The password that is provided by the user for authentication.
trans-unit.target: A palavra-passe que é fornecida pelo utilizador para autenticação.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name for the user.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome do utilizador.

trans-unit.source: You use the UserName property to retrieve the authentication name when you set custom values in the authentication ticket.
trans-unit.target: Utilize a propriedade de nome de utilizador para obter o nome de autenticação quando especificar valores personalizados nos bilhetes de autenticação.

trans-unit.source: Typically, you set the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationTicket.Name%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationTicket> object to the UserName value.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, defina o <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationTicket.Name%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationTicket>objeto para o valor de nome de utilizador.</xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationTicket> </xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationTicket.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name that is provided by the user for authentication.
trans-unit.target: O nome que é fornecido pelo utilizador para autenticação.
